content: inspired by the alp natural openwork sweater this hat uses the roman stripe pattern to echo the openwork with a more stable stitch since hats need to be more durable the roman stripe pattern is usually worked flat as so row 1 k1 *yo k1 repeat from * to last st k1 row 2 k1 p to end k1 row 3 k1 *k2tog repeat from * to last st k1 row 4-5 k1 *yo k2tog repeat from * to last st k1 row 6-7 k when converting to the round the k1 at beginning and end are dropped and the even rounds converted to their wrong side equivalents this is simple for every round except 4 the partner to k2tog is not p2tog because that will slant the wrong way it s ssp which is more complicated than the acronym suggests fine for the occasional stitch in a lace pattern but tedious across an entire row it also leaves a gap at the beginning of the round top pattern row with wrap and turn bottom with ssp the solution is to do a wrap and turn for round 4 working the original row on the wrong side round 1 *yo k1 repeat from * around round 2 knit around round 3 *k2tog repeat from * around wrap and turn round 4 *yo k2tog repeat from * around ws wrap and turn round 5 *yo k2tog repeat from * around round 6 purl around round 7 knit around wrap and turn slip the next stitch perlwise to the right needle bring yarn to the front of the work slip the stitch back to the left needle push the knitting through the middle of the needles so you are now working on the other side make sure the yarn is in the back of the work gauge us# 9 for body of hat us# 7 for ribbing this is a pattern where you might want to adjust the stitch count instead of the needle size using the smaller needles knit a swatch in k2p2 ribbing that is at least 4 wide and at least 10 row count the number of stitches per inch and use the table below stitches/inch med large 4 80 88 5 100 112 brim with smaller needles cast on the stitch count from the chart above work k2 p2 ribbing until piece measures approx 1 5 from co edge body switch to larger needles 2 row knit around pattern rounds 1-7 pattern rounds 1-3 2 row knit around pattern rounds 1-7 pattern rounds 1-3 2 row or until hat is at least 6 from co edge knit around shape
